name: Baptism
description: Done by immersion, it is the cleansing of one's sins and joining Christ's church.

name: Confirmation
description: Receiving the gift of the Holy Ghost by the laying on of hands and confirmation of Church membership.

name: Initiatory
description: A spiritual washing and anointing in preparation to make further covenants.

name: Endowment
description: A sacred ceremony providing instruction, covenants, and spiritual power needed to enter the presence of God.

name: Sealing
description: The binding of families for eternity; can be parent-to-child or spouse-to-spouse.

name: Ordinance Worker
description: Those who have been set apart to perform ordinances in a House of the Lord.

name: Other
description: Any other type of visit not already specified.
